name: Chick-Chick
description:
You play as chickens who have to survive on unstable platforms in various universes of the chicken coop, will you be able to keep the balance and hold on, compete with friends and beat the record!
Chick-Chick is a side-view game where you can compete both alone and with a friend in agility and reaction, dodging obstacles, jumping on platforms and collecting bonuses that will help you hold out as long as possible.

Features of the game:
  • Visual style
  • A game for two
  • Complexity
